author: Steve Jobs
body: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.

author: Albert Schweitzer
body: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.

author: Albert Einstein
body: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity, and growth comes from pain.

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
body: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
body: Believe you can and you're halfway there; confidence is the foundation.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
body: Change your thoughts and you change your world, shaping your reality.

author: Albert Einstein
body: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value and significance.

author: Peter Drucker
body: The best way to predict the future is to create it yourself.

author: Nelson Mandela
body: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

author: Winston Churchill
body: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

author: Nelson Mandela
body: It always seems impossible until it's done; perseverance conquers challenges.

author: William Butler Yeats
body: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.

author: Anonymous
body: If you want to achieve greatness, stop asking for permission and start doing.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
body: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Anonymous
body: Success is not just about making money; it's about making a difference.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
body: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

author: Frank Sinatra
body: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

author: Vince Lombardi
body: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up and keep going.

author: Sam Levenson
body: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going and stay focused.

author: Marilyn vos Savant
body: Success is achieved by developing your strengths, not by eliminating your weaknesses.
